channel.title: The Vulgar Unicorn
channel.description: Support for TVUBBS Software and General Info about TVU BBS

item.title: Welcome to The Vulgar Unicorn
item.dc:creator: megalith
item.description: The Vulgar Unicorn BBS started in 1981 as an Atari BASIC BBS running on a 300 baud modem. December 19, 2022, I decided to attempt to rebuild what I always wanted in a BBS, and nearly got there in the mid-late 80's. TVU is not just the BBS iteself, but also the software running the board. Written in Go, and supporting all the cool stuff I ever wanted.
